channel.title: Quotes on Lindemann
channel.description: Recent content in Quotes on Lindemann

item.title: Quotes â€¢ Home
item.description: Collecting quotes is one of my guilty pleasures. The only criterion for a sentence to find its place in the list below is to make me think. The bar to pass is usually quite low. Once in the list, a quote remains even if I later find it superficial, stupid or offending. Consequently, the following criteria were not taken into account: Whether or not I agree with what is said 1.
